sen.j: 伏見宮邦高親王（ふしみのみや くにたかしんのう、康正2年2月2日 （1456年3月8日） - 享禄5年3月19日 （1532年4月24日））は、室町時代後期の皇族。
sen.e: Imperial Prince Fushimi-no-miya Kunitaka (March 8, 1456 - April 24, 1532) was the Imperial family member during the late Muromachi period.
Imperial Prince Fushimi-no-miya Kunitaka (March 8, 1456 - April 24, 1532) was an Imperial family member during the late Muromachi period.
Imperial Prince Fushiminomiya Kunitaka (March 8, 1456 - April 24, 1532) was an Imperial family member during the late Muromachi period.
He was Shikibukyo. (chief of the Ministry of Ceremonial)
He was Shikibukyo (chief of the Ministry of Ceremonies).
He was Shikibukyo (chief of the Ministry of Ceremonies).
The fifth family head of the Fushiminomiya family
The fifth family head of the Fushiminomiya family
The fifth family head of the Fushiminomiya family

sen.j: 伏見宮貞常親王第一王子。
sen.e: The first Prince of Imperial Prince Fushimi-no-miya Sadatsune
The first Prince of Imperial Prince Fushimi-no-miya Sadatsune
The first Prince of Imperial Prince Fushiminomiya Sadatsune

sen.j: 母は庭田重有の娘・源盈子。
sen.e: His mother was Shigeari NIWATA"s daughter, MINAMOTO no Mitsuko.
His mother was Shigeari NIWATA"s daughter, MINAMOTO no Mitsuko.
His mother was Shigeari NIWATA's daughter, MINAMOTO no Mitsuko.

sen.j: 文明6年（1474年）に元服、親王宣下。
sen.e: He had a coming-of-age ceremony in 1474 and received to title to become Imperial Prince.
He had a coming-of-age ceremony in 1474 and received the title of Imperial Prince.
He had a coming-of-age ceremony in 1474 and received the title of Imperial Prince.
He entered into priesthood in 1516.
He entered into the priesthood in 1516.
He entered into the priesthood in 1516.

sen.j: 王子女に、伏見宮貞敦親王など。
sen.e: His children was Imperial Prince Fushimi-no-miya Sadaatsu.
His child was Imperial Prince Fushimi-no-miya Sadaatsu.
His child was Imperial Prince Fushiminomiya Sadaatsu.
